column4: Hi, I am new here. I was wondering if anyone knows how to access internet on 10.04 LTS?
might not have the driver, I had the same issue with dell laptops and had to upgrade
I have the drivers, I just don't know how to use them. I have a realtek rtl8192ce wireless driver
I have a realtek rtl8192ce wireless driver and I need to "get it" on Ubuntu, I have no idea how
